misc.author: tony_filipone
misc.post:
I thought the representation was probably very close. It looked like a good looking “Middle-Eastern” man in his early 30s.; not the reddish-hair, Indo-European man that we have grown accustomed to seeing in most paintings.
Great Work!
misc.title: Ray Downing of “The Real Face of Jesus?” TV Documentary received an Emmy for “Stealing Lincoln’s Body”
